description:
Something truly bizarre happened with this unit test run:

http://logs.openstack.org/82/116082/1/gate/gate-nova-python26/2312b5e/

The tests all failed with massive temporary filenames - looks like some kind of infinite loop in the NestedTempfile() fixture perhaps

title: Infinite loop / 'File name too long' error from NestedTempfile fixture

comments.content:
Something truly bizarre happened with this unit test run:

http://logs.openstack.org/82/116082/1/gate/gate-nova-python26/2312b5e/

The tests all failed with massive temporary filenames - looks like some kind of infinite loop in the NestedTempfile() fixture perhaps

I didn't see any hits for this bug in the past 10 days so not sure if its been fixed or is just super rare.
